Class EfmlTagsAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tu_dresden.psy.efml.EfmlTagsAttribute

  • public class EfmlTagsAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    class that will store tag information when parsing EFML files

    immanuel
